MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Windows.Media.ImageSource Clone() cil managed

Docs.summary: Creates a modifiable clone of this , making deep copies of this object's values. When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
Docs.returns: A modifiable clone of the current object. The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen%2A> property will be even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen%2A> property was

remarks.format:
## Remarks This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object). For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Windows.Media.ImageSource CloneCurrentValue() cil managed

Docs.summary: Creates a modifiable clone of this object, making deep copies of this object's current values. Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
Docs.returns: A modifiable clone of the current object. The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen%2A> property will be even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen%2A> property was .

remarks.format:
## Remarks This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object). For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.

Docs.summary: When overridden in a derived class, gets the height of the image in measure units (96ths of an inch).

MemberSignature.Value: protected static double PixelsToDIPs (double dpi, int pixels);
.method familystatic hidebysig float64 PixelsToDIPs(float64 dpi, int32 pixels) cil managed

Docs.param: Width of the bitmap, in dots per inch.
Width of the bitmap, in pixels.
Docs.summary: Converts pixels to DIPs in a way that is consistent with MIL.
Docs.returns: The natural size of the bitmap in MIL Device Independent Pixels (DIPs, or 1/96").

MemberSignature.Value: .method hidebysig newslot virtual instance string System.IFormattable.ToString(string format, class System.IFormatProvider provider) cil managed

Docs.param:
The format to use.
-or-
A null reference ( in Visual Basic) to use the default format defined for the type of the <xref:System.IFormattable> implementation.

The provider to use to format the value.
-or-
A null reference ( in Visual Basic) to obtain the numeric format information from the current locale setting of the operating system.
Docs.summary: Formats the value of the current instance using the specified format.
Docs.returns: The value of the current instance in the specified format.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance string ToString(class System.IFormatProvider provider) cil managed

Docs.param: An <xref:System.IFormatProvider> that supplies culture-specific formatting information.
Docs.summary: Creates a string representation of this object based on the <xref:System.IFormatProvider> passed in. If the provider is , the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CurrentCulture%2A> is used.
Docs.returns: A string representation of this object.
